flawed_nl_solution:
He has 30 boxwoods to trim and will charge $5 each so he will charge 30*5 = $<<30*5=510>>510
He will shape 4 boxwoods into spheres for $15 each so he will charge 4*15 = $$<<4*15=60>>60
All total he will charge 510+60 = $<<510+60=570>>570
#### 570

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
